forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain this morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 51F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 51F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 56F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 57F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
